name: Frequent Quran Words
author: Zeshan B

sections.description:
This plugin makes it possible to import most repeated words in Quran as posts with category slug frequent-quran-words.

The translation of the words is used as English post titles. This will allow you to write about the word as a blog post.
sections.installation:
1. Unzip the plugin archive into plugins directory
  2. Login to WordPress admin dashboard
  3. Activate plugin
  4. Click import from left menu to import words as posts under category Frequent Quran Words
sections.faq:
Questions about this plugin

Ask a question on the forum for this plugin or contact zdatatech.com
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Import words from sql dump file as posts

1.0.1

  • Fixed issue with import file line

1.2.0

  • fixed issue with ajax requests. Delete posts button disables after clicking. Add notice of posts deletion.
